hero.title: Hello, I'm Jonathan
hero.subtitle: A frontend developer driving visions into reality

about.title: About Me.
about.paragraph: Coming from a marketing background, I transitioned into frontend development driven by my passion for creating engaging websites and apps that captivate users and guide them effortlessly. I'm continuously exploring design trends and using new technologies.
about.toolsSubtitle: My current go to stack for building modern websites and applications, got some more up my sleeve.
